291:1: vajragarmo bodhisattva āha - yo'yaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvaḥ pañcamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau suparipūrṇamārgaḥ ṣaṣṭhīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimavatarati |
291:4: yaduta sarvadharmānimittasamatayā ca sarvadharmālakṣaṇasamatayā ca sarvadharmānutpādasamatayā ca sarvadharmājātatayā ca sarvadharmaviviktasamatayā ca sarvadharmādiviśuddhisamatayā ca sarvadharmaniṣprapañcasamatayā ca sarvadharmānāvyūhānirvyūhasamatayā ca sarvadharmamāyāsvapnapratibhāsapratiśrutkodakacandrapratibimbanirmāṇasamatayā ca sarvadharmabhāvābhāvādvayasamatayā ca |
291:6: sa evaṃsvabhāvān sarvadharmān pratyavakṣemāṇo'nusṛjan anulomayan avilomayan śraddadhan abhiyan pratiyan avikalpayan anusaran vyavalokayan pratipadyamānaḥ ṣaṣṭhīmabhimukhīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanuprāpnoti tīkṣṇayā ānulomikyā kṣāntyā |
291:8: sa evaṃsvabhāvān sarvadharmānanugacchan bhūyasyā mātrayā mahākaruṇāpūrvaṃgamatvena mahākaruṇādhipateyatayā mahākaruṇāparipūrṇārthaṃ lokasya saṃbhavaṃ ca vibhavaṃ ca vyavalokayate |
291:9: tasya lokasya saṃbhavaṃ ca vibhavaṃ ca vyavalokayata evaṃ bhavati - yāvatyo lokasamudācāropapattayaḥ sarvāḥ,
291:12: tasyaivaṃ bhavati - tena khalu punarime bālabuddhya ātmābhiniviṣṭā ajñānatimirāvṛtā bhāvābhāvābhilāṣiṇo'yoniśomanasikāraprasṛtā vipathaprayātā mithyānucāriṇaḥ puṇyāpuṇyāneñjyānabhisaṃskārānupacinvanti |
291:13: teṣāṃ taiḥ saṃskārairavaropitaṃ cittabījaṃ sāsravaṃ sopādānamāyatyāṃ jātijarāmaraṇapunarbhavābhinirvṛttisaṃbhavopagataṃ bhavati |
291:46: mriyamāṇasya vigacchataḥ saṃmūḍhasya sābhiṣvaṅgasya hṛdayasaṃtāpaḥ śokaḥ |
291:51: evamayaṃ kevalo duḥkhaskandho duḥkhavṛkṣo'bhinirvartate kārakavedakavirahita iti ||
291:56: yānyapīmāni dvādaśa bhavāṅgāni tathāgatena prabhedaśo vyākhyātāni,
291:59: yasmin vastuni hi rāgasaṃyuktaṃ cittamutpadyate tadvijñānam |
291:107: maraṇamapi dvividhakāryapratyupasthānaṃ bhavati - saṃskāravidhvaṃsanaṃ ca karoti,
291:118: evameva trivartma nirātmakamātmātmīyarahitaṃ saṃbhavati ca asaṃbhavayogena,
291:120: api tu khalu punaryaducyate - avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityeṣā paurvāntikyapekṣā |
291:125: api tu khalu punastriduḥkhatā dvādaśa bhavāṅgānyupādāya|
291:142: sa evaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratyavekṣate'nulomapratilomaṃ yaduta bhavāṅgānusaṃdhitaśca ekacittasamavasaraṇataśca svakarmāsaṃbhedataśca avinirbhāgataśca trivartmānuvartanataśca pūrvāntapratyutpannāparāntāvekṣaṇataśca triduḥkhatāsamudayataśca hetupratyayaprabhavataśca utpādavyayavinibandhanataśca abhāvākṣayatāpratyavekṣaṇataśca ||
291:143: tasyaivaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇasya nirātmato niḥsattvato nirjīvato niṣpudgalataḥ kārakavedakarahitato'svāmikato hetupratyayādhīnataḥ svabhāvaśūnyato viviktato'svabhāvataśca prakṛtyā pratyavekṣamāṇasya śūnyatāvimokṣamukhamājātaṃ bhavati ||
291:146: tasyaivaṃ śūnyatānimittamavatīrṇasya na kaścidabhilāṣa utpadyate anyatra mahākaruṇāpūrvakātsattvaparipācanāt |
291:148: ya imāni trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni bhāvayan ātmaparasaṃjñāpagato kārakavedakasaṃjñāpagato bhāvābhāvasaṃjñāpagato bhūyasyā mātrayā mahākaruṇāpuraskṛtaḥ prayujyate'pariniṣpannānāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ pariniṣpattaye,
291:153: hanta vayamevaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ viditvā asya saṃyogasya asyāḥ sāmagryā vyavacchedaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ,
291:155: evamasya bhavanto jinaputrāḥ saṃskāragataṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ svabhāvarahitamanutpannāniruddhaṃ prakṛtyā pratyavekṣamāṇasya mahākaruṇābhinirhārataśca sattvakāryānutsargataśca saṅgajñānābhimukho nāma prajñāpāramitāvihāro'bhimukhībhavatyavabhāsayogena |
291:156: sa evaṃ jñānasamanvāgataḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārāvabhāsito bodhyaṅgāhārakāṃśca pratyayānupasaṃharati |
291:160: tasya asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya avatāraśūnyatā ca nāma samādhirājāyate |
291:164: tasya bhūyasyā mātrayā asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasyabhedyāśayatā ca paripūryate |
291:166: tasyaite daśa bodhisattvāśayāḥ svanugatā bhavanti tathāgatabodhau |
291:176: tasya asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya prajñāpāramitāvihāro'tiriktatara ājāto bhavati,
291:177: tīkṣṇā cānulomikī tṛtīyā kṣāntireṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yathāvadanulomatayā na vilomatayā ||
291:178: tasya asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya yathāvatsamāpattiprajñājñānālokatayā prayujyate,
291:181: tasya asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya anekān kalpāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni bhūyasyā mātrayā uttaptaprabhāsvaratarāṇi bhavanti |
291:184: tadyathāpi nāma bhavanto jinaputrāstadeva jātarūpaṃ vaiḍūryaparisṛṣṭaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayottaptaprabhāsvarataraṃ bhavati,
291:185: evameva bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvasya asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya tāni kuśalamūlānyupāyaprajñājñānavicāritāni bhūyasyā mātrayottaptaprabhāsvaratarāṇi bhavanti,
291:187: tadyathāpi nāma bhavanto jinaputrāścandrābhā sattvāśrayāṃśca prahlādayati asaṃhāryā ca bhavati catasṛbhirvātamaṇḍalībhiḥ,
291:188: evameva bhavanto jinaputra bodhisattvasya asyāmabhimukhyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya tāni kuśalamūlānyanekeṣāṃ sattvakoṭinayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ kleśajvālāḥ praśamayanti,
291:191: tasya daśabhyaḥ pāramitābhyaḥ prajñāpāramitā atiriktatamā bhavati,
291:192: na ca pariśeṣā na samudāgacchati yathābalaṃ yathābhajamānam |
291:193: iyaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvasya abhimukhī nāma ṣaṣṭhī bodhisattvabhūmiḥ samāsanirdeśataḥ,
291:194: yasyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo bhūyastvena sunirmito bhavati devarājaṃ kṛtī prabhuḥ sattvānāmabhimānapratiprasrabdhaye kuśalaḥ sattvānyābhimānikadharmebhyo vinivartayitum |
291:195: asaṃhāryaśca bhavati sarvaśrāvakaparipṛcchāyāṃ kuśalaḥ sattvān pratītyasamutpāde'vatārayitum |
